data.eml:eml: A new Theosbaena (Thermosbaenacea: Halosbaenidae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rogers, D. Christopher, Sanoamuang, La-Orsri (2016): A new Theosbaena (Thermosbaenacea: Halosbaenidae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 4109 (4): 471-478, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4109.4.5
